page.title: 15TOURISM
page.content: Visitors ho come to {FALMOUTH}can find plenty of things to do.They can be lazy on the beaches,go for cliff walks,rockpooling,boating,windsurfing, canoeing or visiting places of interest.Of course some people like to go window shopping.Of the most interesting places,{PENDENNIS CASTLE } is probably the best.You can wander round the Keep, or look round the grounds.There is the best veiw of { {FALMOUTH}from the castle walls.There are several pretty gardens in the town to look at.{KIMBERLEY PARK}and { {FOX-ROSEHILL GARDENS }are perhaps the best.Lots of people like to climb{ {JACOBS LADDER}which is a flight of { {111 }steps.At the pier many boats are ready to take the visitors on trips.
